SEARCH

Package org.project.Controller.Messages

package org.project.Controller.Messages
  • Class
    Description
    ChatMessage
    Represents a chat message with a username and a text.
    CreateGame_Message
    Represents a message for creating a game.
    JoinMessage
    Represents a message for join a game.
    Message
    The class represents a generic message and is used as a superclass for other classes representing specific types of messages.
    MessageID
    Enumeration of the different types of messages presented in the game
    PickMessage
    Represents a message for the coordinates of the picked tiles Contains information about the username and a list of coordinates.
    PopUpMsg
    Represents a message for displaying a pop-up message.
    PreTurnMsg
    Represents a message sent before a player's turn.
    QuitMessage
    Represents a message indicating a player's intention to quit the game.
    RefreshMsg
    Represents a message for refreshing the game state.
    ScoreBoardMsg
    Represents a message containing the score board information.
    TopUpMessage
    Represents a message indicating a player's intention to "topUp" their grid with a tile from the specified column and tile index.
    UpdatePickMsg
    Represents a message containing the updated pick information.
    UpdateTopUPMsg
    Represents a message containing the updated "topUp" information.
